properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ORDER_NO , MEM_ID , TO_CHAR(REF_RQ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "REF_RQ_DT" , DECODE(REF_FIN_DT, NULL, '-', TO_CHAR(REF_FIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) "REF_FIN_DT" , TO_CHAR(REF_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REF_PRICE" , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "REG_DATE" , DECODE(REG_PAY, 0, '카드', 1, '무통장') "REG_PAY" , CL_NO , DECODE(REF_STA, 'N', '환불신청', 'Y', '환불완료') "REF_STA" , REF_REA FROM REFUND RF JOIN MEMBER M ON(RF.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN REGISTER ON(ORDER_NO = REG_NO) ORDER BY REF_RQ_DT DESC)
UPDATE REFUND SET REF_STA = ? WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
UPDATE REFUND SET REF_FIN_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ORDER_NO = ? AND REF_STA = 'Y'
UPDATE REFUND SET REF_FIN_DT = NULL WHERE ORDER_NO = ? AND REF_STA = 'N'

SELECT ORDER_NO , TO_CHAR(REF_RQ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DY) HH24:MI:SS') "REF_RQ_DT" , TO_CHAR(REF_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REF_PRICE" , REF_BANK , REF_ACC , REF_NM , DECODE(REF_STA, 'N', '환불신청', 'Y', '환불완료') "REF_STA" , REF_REA FROM REFUND WHERE ORDER_NO = ?

SELECT REG_NO , CL_NO , TEACH_DATE , REG_PAY , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , DEPOSIT_STA , CL_THUMB , CL_NAME , START_TIME , DISTR_NAME
FROM REGISTER R LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS C ON C.CL_NO = R.CL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN DISTRICT D ON D.DISTR_CODE = C.DISTR_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON S.SCH_NO = R.SCH_NO WHERE REG_NO=?
INSERT INTO REFUND ( ORDER_NO , MEM_NO , REF_RQ_DT , REF_PRICE , REF_BANK , REF_ACC , REF_NM , REF_REA ) VALUES ( ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE REGISTER SET REG_STA = '3' WHERE REG_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , REF_PRICE , REF_BANK , REF_ACC , REF_NM FROM REFUND WHERE ORDER_NO= ?
